segments.text: I need help finding a gift for my daughter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A Mac is a very popular brand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She mentioned a Mac . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A 15 - inch Pro model is $ 2,100 plus tax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like a great price . I'll take one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is a gift she'll cherish for years . How do you want to pay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're almost through . Just sign here , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just take it home and plug it in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She'll be online 20 minutes after she opens the box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's going to be so pleased with this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Remember us for all your computer needs .
segments.speaker: S2
